name: Realms of Ruby
description: ROR is a metaverse where players can build their own world and interact with other communities with $RUBY tokens built on the BNB chain powering the gamified ecosystem. Players will be able to interact and socialize with their community, play games together, access to casual entertainment, make online and offline purchases through our ecommerce store and enjoy a rich selection of media content curated by content creators. Our goal is to bring Play & Earn and ROR to the real world through a universal app where the $RUBY tokens can be spent both online and offline. The combined online and offline utilities of the $RUBY tokens which include gaming, social, defi, play & earn, community & rewards will strengthen RORâ€™s overall value proposition.
